title: Start
body:
<<move Aig StageLeft2>><<move Jaypee StageRight2>>
J-Pe: Aig.
Aig: Yeah?
J-Pe: I know Lee talked to you about this yesterday, but really, you have to get your shit together.
J-Pe: Our debut concert is in TWO DAYS, and if you ruin this for m--US...I swear to god-
->I'll work harder
    Aig: I'll work harder, I swear!
->Oopsy?
    Aig:Uh...oopsy?
    J-Pe: Seriously? That's all you have to say?
    J-Pe: If this is you trying to brand yourself as "the cute one"...
    J-Pe: NEWSFLASH--you won't even get to debut if you don't get your head in the game.
->I do what I want.
    Aig: I do what I want. I mean, I'm pretty sure I'm, like, the main character here, so...
    J-Pe: Are you even listening to yourself? Are you really going to let years of training end like this?
J-Pe: PLEASE, Aig. I really need you to work harder. I don't want to have to debut without you.
Aig: Aw, that's so sweet--
J-Pe: I mean, can you imagine? If I have to debut as a DUO with LEE? Name one successful duo.
<<flip Jaypee>>
J-Pe: GOD!
<<move Jaypee OffStageRight>>
Aig:...or not.
